name: insomnia-plugin-request-body-hmac-query-string
author: Benjamin LETELLIER <letellier.benjamin@gmail.com>
description: Insomnia template tag for HMAC signature of value or request body turn into query string, like name=value&name2=value2

insomnia.name: request-body-hmac-query-string
insomnia.description: Generates HMAC signatures for request bodies and values in query string
